03920eed-6df4-47a5-9a16-ca411729be24: The Navigator starts all {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, including {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}, with +3 additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}. The first ally, targeted each turn by the Navigator with a single-target {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, gains the same amount of additional movement points at the start of their next turn.
04461561-11fb-4724-9494-6299d35843c8: Whenever the Navigator uses a Navigator power that hasn't been used this combat, the Navigator gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} until the end of combat.
082e562d-6815-4abc-949f-4ca7ff180e3b: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer +{uip|DamageBonus|e406f5febaa0417892d1b55e9223761e}% additional damage from {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} damage stacks for each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}.
0b1773f4-718c-4ef1-9c6d-19d82cbc938c: All {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against Navigator powers suffer a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|d1825e9618cb4b9f9e06d12e3824d5c3} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
0bcdef0a-8bd0-4ceb-8628-f49d30e86408:
The Navigator decreases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} points.
All allies gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
0faf46f0-7790-4f11-bce6-4aabfff3308c: The Navigator gains +5 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and an additional +1 to Fellowship for every Navigator {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} and/or Navigator power taken.
160a2a33-7bc1-4b03-85a8-003f66f426bd: The Navigator creates a circle with a 3-cell radius. Any creature that is inside it, enters it, or ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} inside, not under the effect of apathy, makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. Failure applies the Apathy effect to the creature. Apathy: The target is {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. After one round passes under the effect of apathy, the target must make a Willpower resistance test. Success removes apathy. Failure stuns the creature for 1 round, removes apathy, and makes the creature immune to further effects from Spot of Apathy until the end of the combat.
16c92564-1091-42b7-86be-066e03edfea5:
The first use on any target marks it with the under the Navigator's watch effect. Enemy targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to avoid this.
The second use returns the target to the position where it was during the first use and restores its {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to the state they were at during that time.
If this cell is occupied or unreachable from their current position, they move to the next closest cell in the direction of the Navigator.
175003a4-54ca-436f-83d9-76dfeed6717c: While under effect of any Navigator power, enemies have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by −{uip|ResistancePenalty|79abfcdecc5f434b80214d0c8647fe3e}. This reduction is increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter of the Navigator's staff but does not stack.
1775ba42-6749-4619-a146-2189c3d1e734: Enemies moved by the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} suffer {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} at the end of movement. This damage is increased by +2 for every cell the enemy moves.
1cfdc8fc-dbdf-48bd-8d12-a04901862629: Allies get <u>Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}</u>% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from Navigator powers and gain +<u>(2 × Navigator's PER {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against Navigator powers.
2f79eb65-a5a9-43b5-ab39-159a8784b3fc: The target gains +{uip|ChanceBonus|6f1395647e8b4f6cb47bce10d7cccd2f}% increased {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} on their next attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} on their next dodge, and resistance on their next {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. Each of these {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} disappear independently from each other after being successfully applied.
3629891e-0768-418f-a604-4f2a270ab853: Enemies affected by the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} suffer a stacking −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to the next {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} from the Navigator's powers. The penalty is lost after such a {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} is made.
3a3904b3-b31f-404a-9a21-3e67fd2dd936: The Navigator designates a square. The enemy closest to that square immediately moves up to 4 cells toward it. If multiple enemies are the same distance from that point, all of them move. The targets move even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.
4489e9c2-1c83-4694-b6d9-3f408f4e4c16: All creatures in a cone in front of the Navigator suffer <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|b932b545f5d8460ab562b0003294e775} to {uip|MaxDamage|b932b545f5d8460ab562b0003294e775})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The affected targets must also pass a +30 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
505c0b64-d3b6-4b90-8c8e-81d805b44c58: All enemies within a 4-cell radius circle suffer a −{uip|StatPenalty|3db1b866b28e4256b359b89f45a6f38a} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} until the end of the combat.
62a4eb5f-dc26-4549-876f-651c0c6cbd68: The first use of a damaging Navigator power does not start the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of this power. The second use of a damaging Navigator power will deal an additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter to all targets and the same amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator.
62bd760f-73ff-4dad-b8b7-311b77c4fb1e: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies that have at least one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in one of their weapon sets. The target immediately gains an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} during which they gain the ability to use Charge and only this ability. Charge (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}): Allows the target ally to dash in a straight line by 6 cells. If they collide with a creature during that movement, they attack that creature (even if it is an ally) with their melee weapon.
660a289f-0c02-4ad3-bb18-044e4e7c4769: Deals (from {uip|MinDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} to {uip|MaxDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327}) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all targets in line and inflicts the soul burn effect. Soul Burn: target suffers {uip|BurnDamage|08767fbd714148ae88d5b1daf1dbc327} damage at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. At the end of their turn, they must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} to remove the flames. When {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, psykers suffer additional damage every time they use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, and daemons — every time they attack or use {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g}.
6d474d7a-c9d6-4439-b082-7f01e1b98519: Any effects, applied by the Navigator and activated at the start or at the end of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, are inflicted one additional time at the end of every one of the Navigator's turn.
6dffab84-dd8a-4de7-95cd-061299c2edc2: Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:VeilDegradationGlossary}warp{/g} effects (caused by daemons, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, Navigator powers, etc.) until the end of combat. The effect stacks with every applied Navigator ability.
7979fed4-8606-4943-99b1-aacc3ea025b3: Navigator path powers deal +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} of the Navigator's currently equipped staff. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} count as characteristics for this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}.
7bdc6921-4801-4933-9ede-3551450747a9: The target ally gains +{uip|StatBonus|8b97251d56204c40904d06c927930572} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} until the end of the combat.
83c11703-f24e-49cb-89e5-79841c6c47c9: Creates a 3×3 zone. Every creature that is in it, enters it, or begins their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in the area, suffers <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} to {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The zone remains for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} or until the Navigator casts it again.
a3ea1d84-e2d2-48e7-bcbc-facfad229785: Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} parameter until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.
a45d4b2f-553e-4789-abd5-17a2dbf389f2: The Navigator makes all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} if it is higher than the base {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} for such {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If the Navigator's Willpower is higher than their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are calculated according to their Willpower.
a47de320-96eb-4691-b006-34d647872e95: All enemies in a 6-cell radius around the target point must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move 3 cells toward that point. The targets move even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.
aae8d8f3-91d9-46c0-be9b-cce07b8d64bf: Whenever the Navigator uses a Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is reduced by −1.
b335ea0e-5d3c-48a1-b9d1-f32477075211: The enemy becomes cursed until the end of combat. Сursed: all incoming {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|WarpDamageBonus|3705e0ad78154ee0bd6436fc15dac784}% and other types of incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} are increased by +{uip|DamageBonus|3705e0ad78154ee0bd6436fc15dac784}%. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the enemy closest to them also becomes cursed.
b48df9c0-fdcf-443b-a226-464a727b942b: All Navigator powers now have a chance to score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}. Their basic critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} is equal to <u>(Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} / 2)</u>%.
b79878f4-d1dc-47f9-bbf5-d8c40114329e: All units in a 3×3 zone must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone, even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the Navigator's allies that have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or that are outside the zone.
ba792556-1308-4ac8-9ea6-5cea12833bb8: Until the end of combat, enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} damage from all {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} them.
bc45137a-8f8c-4eca-8561-8e6e88cb9480:
All enemies in a 1-cell radius around the target point must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. Those who fail, even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, immediately gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} where they attack their allies.
Every time an enemy becomes the target of this Navigator power again during the same combat, they gain a stackable +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against it.
c3a39c5c-408f-4034-a1df-fd784965eac9: Whenever an enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against a Navigator's power, attacks against them gain +{uip|CritChanceBonus|d01deb8d10f64c8cbd0717df85adb61b}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}. The effect stacks but is reset by a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}.
ce0ae9de-c483-4340-8e57-4962a385dcc5: The Navigator deals <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076} to {uip|MaxDamage|ec639338f11e49b1a75a7b9757a77076})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy. That enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Immobilised targets do not regain {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} at the beginning of their turn and cannot use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that move them or add movement points.
dc4ac5be-13de-467b-9f0d-cb318171f1db: The Navigator heals {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gains +1 additional wound for every Navigator {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} taken. The healing increases by +1 for every creature killed in between the Navigator's turns.
dd1de461-4d2c-43be-b986-30fefeda3cd3: Whenever a creature in combat gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the Navigator gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat.
dfe201a8-f202-4faf-9547-169d51c39b93: If the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} is higher than their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is calculated using Perception instead.
eb08c44d-4569-4e77-bd8b-ee4c8eb7ab8a: Enemies that become targets of the Navigator's powers suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}castigating{/g} parameter until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.
ec2c8be8-596f-4dde-93fb-60e0a2c3d83d: Every enemy the Navigator has in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} has its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} reduced by −{uip|DodgePenalty|51fa09bfa6334b46ac543174326fbd33}.
ed653dff-259e-44cb-92e7-bed56fbc3e49: Every even (second, fourth, etc.) {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Navigator gains an additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}. Every odd turn (first, third, etc.) the Navigator gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.
ee9609ad-a899-4e1b-a425-848466e8d66c: Allies suffer −{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|stat}% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from Navigator powers and gain +{uip|ResistanceBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7} to {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against them. Glimpse of Fate: the target gains +{uip|ChanceBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7}% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} on their next attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} on the next attack against them, and success chance on their next resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. Each of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} gained cease independently from each other when successfully applied.
fccc1e1d-1423-435d-866b-04db4fc37742: Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's power gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. This additional armour is reduced by the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} (to a minimum of +0%) and increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} of the currently equipped Navigator's staff.
fd9c6da0-4a07-4d1b-81d4-8102a221fb55: All Navigator powers gain +{uip|CritChance|1b425f19327f429eb4fbfae69950b868}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}. ff1e8061-73ff-4f5a-9383-0fe862e58f01: All {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against Navigator powers gain a −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
